00050 // the syntax for explicitly calling the destructor varies on some platforms
00051 // below is the default syntax as defined by another ARM project
00052 #define OSCL_TEMPLATED_DESTRUCTOR_CALL(type,simple_type) ~type ()
00053 
00054 
00055 /* The __TFS__ macro is used to optionally expand to "<>" depending on the
00056  * compiler.  Some compilers require it to indicate that the friend function
00057  * is a template function as specified in the standard, but others don't
00058  * like it so it will handled with a macro expansion that depends on the
00059  * compiler.
00060  */
00061 #define __TFS__ <>

00065 #define OSCL_PACKED_STRUCT_BEGIN
00066 #define OSCL_PACKED_STRUCT_END  __attribute__((packed))

00068 //set this to 1 to enable OSCL_ASSERT in release builds.
